      public Order addOrder(List<Product> product, boolean urgent, String name)
      This method allows the operator to create an order for a company
      Parameters:
      product - list of products that will contain the order
      urgent - boolean parameter that determines if the order is urgent (true or false)
      name - company name that wants to create an order
      Returns:
      order added

    • registerCompany

      public boolean registerCompany(String name, String password, String cardNumber, long CIF, String email, String address, int code) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Method to register a company given its data
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the company
      password - Password of the company
      cardNumber - Credit card number of the company
      CIF - CIF number of a company
      email - Email of the company
      address - Address of the company
      code - Postal code of the company
      Returns:
      True if the company is successfully registered. False otherwise
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
      IOException
